data.name: Prison Girl
data.detailed_description:
The girl Mei is framed to kill, become the inmate of X prison. The player plays a girl in the prison to survive and eventually try to escape the prison.
· 3D perspective, keyboard control movement, mouse control perspective.
· Complete prison system, including: dormitory, administration building, canteen, playground, bathroom, infirmary, office...
· During the day, players complete various quests in the prison.
· Players can sneak around the prison to search for resources at night.
· Enhance friendship with different NPCS.

data.short_description: The girl Mei is framed to kill, become the inmate of X prison. The player plays a girl in the prison to survive and eventually try to escape the prison.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/8/10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: i5 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win8/win10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: i7 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Legs, belly and shoulders may be exposed, but no private parts will be. Game props involve cigarettes and alcohol. The game is not suitable for young players.
